topic.title: zero:// urls scheme
topic.body:
What do you think about handeling urls like
zero://<hash or domain>
and automatically open new tab in browser?

1604065064_mirrored_GomZik_github.body: But, you can handle urls like zero://hash by zeronet core (or something like) and open in browser with url http:// 127.0.0.1/hash
